featured.text: Today, CGI (computer generated imagery) is widely used in filmmaking, and it is now 29 to create very lifelike scenes without using real stunt people.

definition.zh_def: 意象；形象化的描述或表現，通常用於文學或藝術中以激發感官的印象。
definition.en_def: Visually descriptive or figurative language, especially in a literary work, that evokes sensory experiences.
definition.example: The poet used vivid imagery to paint a picture of the sunset.
